casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Terrence Rodricus ELLIOTT. No. 184A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 13, 2006. M. Gordon Widenhouse, Jr., Chapel Hill, for Elliott. William N. Farrell, Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of February 2006 by Appellee for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 14th day of February 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 13th day of February 2006."
